attributes.action: improve the level of compensation paid by the PPF and the FSA to members of failed pension schemes by using and returning revenue that was raised from taxation on pension funds when they were considered  to be in good health
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been stated that the tax payers should not be expected to bail out failed pension schemes. If it is fair and equitable to tax pension schemes and raise revenue into the public purse then surely it also fair and equitable to return an appropriate amount of revenue to better compensate the pensioners who have now lost out through no fault of their own
